message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to you. After careful consideration and evaluation, I am offering this exceptional item to you at a special price of $1150000. This is an exclusive chance to secure a piece that is worth $1200000 to you, allowing you to save $50000 compared to purchasing it elsewhere. I believe this is a fair and advantageous offer that respects both the value of the product and your budget. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer. I am looking forward to your response.
